/**
 * Set the turn column corresponding to 3,4 or 5 helix patterns. If starting

 * converted to X. If a number was set, it will be overwritten by the new
 * character.
 *
 * @param c
 *            character in the column
 * @param t
 *            turn of the helix {3,4,5}
